mapper.select: SELECT c.complaint_no AS complaintNo, c.title, c.category, c.status, c.created_date AS createdDate, COUNT(pl.complaint_no) AS likeCount FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN post_like pl ON c.complaint_no = pl.complaint_no GROUP BY c.complaint_no ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'RECEIVED' THEN 1 END) AS received, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'IN_PROGRESS' THEN 1 END) AS processing, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 END) AS completed FROM complaint
